name: My Roommate is Mothman?!
description:
Your college roommate by random selection is Mothman, and he's The Worst. A new spot has opened up in a dorm nearby, and so begins your quest to get Mothman to request a room change.

Features four endings - a dead end, a good end, a bad end, and a secret end. Takes about thirty minutes to get through everything.

I made this trying to learn Ren'py for bigger projects so it's really short and silly, but I hope people enjoy it regardless. Thanks for checking it out!
